The search term: cheesecake factory closing restaurants" appeared in Google's "Trending Searches" on mobile phones, indicating public interest in the claim.
The claim was found to be inaccurate as: a restaurant owned by The Cheesecake Factory Inc., not all of its restaurants.
The financial update provided by The Che: stated that the majority of their restaurants, including 187 Cheesecake Factory locations, were operating with reopened indoor dining rooms, contradicting the claim of all restaurants closing.
